name: PubGenie
overview:
PubGenie are market leaders at marketing and representation for individual publicans within the UK pub trade. Having grown a team of some of the most well renowned and established breweries and tenanted pub companies, as well as some of the most successful individuals within all aspects of the trade, PubGenie is perfectly positioned to provided publicans with all they need in order to keep trade booming.

Current statistics show that 18 pubs are closing in the UK per week. PubGenie has specifically designed a package along with its team and partners in order to ensure that our publicans are not adding to those statistics. Please click here for our case studies.

Our team and partners have been selected in order to bring the best of all aspects of the industry to our members. Please see our package for further details on what we provide.
